Class ComplexNumberLexer

java.lang.Object
org.flag4j.io.parsing.Lexer
org.flag4j.io.parsing.ComplexNumberLexer
class ComplexNumberLexer extends Lexer
A lexer for producing the tokens of a complex number represented as a string.

  • Method Details

    • getNextToken

      public Token getNextToken()
      Produces next Token from complex number string. Also removes this Token from the string. This method implements a finite automata which describes the legal arrangement of tokens within a complex number.
      Specified by:
      getNextToken in class Lexer
      Returns:
      Next Token in string.
      Throws:
      Flag4jParsingException - If the string is not a valid representation of a complex number.
